attributes.action: Take the energy companies and make it government run and investigate profitering
attributes.additional_details: Why are we paying private European companies to supply us with electricity/gas and explain why and who are benefiting while we struggle
attributes.background: Take back from private companies the electricity and gas and make it so we can decide who get profits from it not massive bonuses to private companies and who if any GB contracts profit and how much.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621719
